metadata.title: Convert HEIC to PNG - Free Online Image Converter | Toolaze
metadata.description: Convert HEIC/HEIF images to PNG format instantly. Batch convert up to 100 images. Preserve quality and transparency. 100% free and private.

hero.desc: Convert HEIC to PNG online for free. Simply drop your HEIC images below to convert them to PNG in seconds.

intro.title: Lossless Conversion
intro.content: PNG is a lossless format that supports transparency, making it ideal for graphics and images that require high quality. Convert your HEIC images to PNG for better compatibility.

scenes.title: Graphic Design
scenes.desc: Convert HEIC to PNG for design software compatibility.

scenes.title: Quality Preservation
scenes.desc: Maintain lossless quality when converting HEIC images.

faq.a: PNG supports transparency, so if your HEIC image has transparency, it will be preserved.
PNG is a lossless format, so quality is fully preserved during conversion.
